channel.title: R&M S3 - ★彡 Hype 彡★
channel.description:
Anyone else excited for Rick and Morty Season 3 Episode 2 tonight? (well of course you are, who isn't?)
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DeAw6aXHzcY
I am extremely excited for it tonight, and on top of that there's a new episode of Game of Thrones aswell, so- two new episodes of great shows tonight.

item.title: R&M S3 - ★彡 Hype 彡★
item.dc:creator: Dooku
item.description:
Ha. It was awesome and now they’re on a frequent schedule. Every Sunday at 11:30 PM (EST) I look forward to it, everyday, shortly after Game of Thrones. Two great shows airing new episodes in one night every weekend. This is the life man.
